FuncDef: The display ptp command displays 1588v2 running information. The display ptp command displays 1588v2 running information. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H-48S6CQ, CE6881H-48S6CQ-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the configurations of all 1588v2-related modules on the current device.
-

Displays the protocol running status of all 1588v2-related modules on the current device.
-

Displays statistics about the 1588v2 messages sent and received on a specified interface.
-

Displays all 1588v2 statistics on the current device.
-

ExtraInfo: You can run this command to check the running status of a 1588v2-enabled device.
